idAbs.para: Iterates over a list of values.

summary.para: Iterates over a list of values.

bullet_item.para: This tool is intended for use in ModelBuilder and not in Python scripting.
The tool iterates over multiple input values of a single type, such as feature classes, rasters, tables, and so on.

The best practice is to create a by clicking Insert Create Variable. In the Create Variable dialog box, choose the data type and check Multivalue. Connect the variable to the Input Values parameter of Interate Multivalue using the Add Connection tool
.
Interate Multivalue differs from using , , , , or because it gives you the capability of selecting a set of inputs.

If an Iterator is added to a model, all tools in the model iterate for each value in the iterator. If you do not want to run each tool in the model for each iterated value, create a that contains only the iterator and add it as a model tool into the main model.
